chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:
Product not as expected, unfortunately it has scratches on the back.
Thank you very much for your help,

The customer confirms that the product did not suffer any damage from a fall or water and was not opened by a third party.

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we will refund €60 to the customer for discrepancy in the aesthetic grade.

Kind regards, Diogo from Back Market
